room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent" by Mind Maze Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: What a great and fun experience! Took my daughter and several of her friends for her 13th birthday. It was challenging for sure!! The owners made it spectacular! Clean. Fun. Well organized. A true delight!! We did the Secret Agent room. Will FOR SURE be going back!!

room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent" by Mind Maze Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: My husband and I took my sister to do the Mad Scientist room and had such a great time we went back the next day with our family to do the Secret Agent room. The people who own it are so sweet and the owner is a navy veteran and everyone we came into contact with there were so nice. We will definitely be going back next time we come into town. Overall a great experience both times!

room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent" by Mind Maze Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Great experience! Such a fun time for a group. We accomplished the Secret Agent room with ten people (and our outside lifeline Patrick), with just minutes to spare! Great atmosphere, and staff.
